They plotted to infect the king himself as to teach him a lesson, this plan never came to fruition as one of the the members of the group of werewoman was loyal to the king and betrayed the rest of her kind. They were killed by the kings guard shortly after the traitor spoke of their whereabouts. However the traitor soon became guilty of herself for betraying her mind and so she began to spread the gene secretly as much as she could but was soon discovered just as her sisters had been by a rogue werewoman she had just infected. She got most of them out into hiding before she was to killed by the kings guard, now the only werewoman in existence are the ones smart enough to leave in the beginning and the ones that were infected and they live in hiding in a land they made together far from any kingdom, so far in fact, that the kingdom's that knew of the werewoman soon forgot about them or merely acted like they didn't exist until finally they died out and the next generation had no idea that such a people existed.

While the werewoman continued to live their own lives some were born male but still became female in the night so as to continue the race. Some would go out into the world and live among the 'regulars' as they called them, some survived with friends, some survived with a alarm dog who would harm at anyone who got too close in the night.


Now to continue with the werewomen's powers

-they have access to magic of some sort as in making things appear as if they are another thing (as in making a cat look and act as a dog) however this only works as long as they are focusing on this and can only be done while the werewoman is in their female form.

-they can run really fast and have invisibility but only for 15 minutes before they grow too weak to continue with this hard magic.

-finally, as stated before, really powerful werewoman can change between forms but what forgot to mention is if they have this power they can swap between all the forms they have bitten (like it they bite you they now have the ability to turn into you...... and you still become a werewoman) this, like I said is very dangerous as it is done incorrectly or excessively will injure, paralyze, or in some cases kill the werewoman.

Now that we have established the background and abilities of a swordsman let's see how a our character will react to being a were woman but first legs ask a simple question.

Was Mike born with the werewomen gene but for some reason it's effects are just now coming out.

Or was Mike bitten by or who was particularly fond of spreading the species.

choices: go home and hope this is all a dream
15321112.content:
Once you arrive in the bathroom and look into the mirror, you see your Aunt Caroline staring back at you: https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773...

"Holy shit! I'm my Aunt!" You whisper as to not wake the rest of the house, "how did this happen? And why Aunt Caroline?" you say as you poke your new gigantic breasts with your new fingers. Suddenly you hear a knock on the window outside and you see a feminine hand wave at you, "what the fuck?" You say in confusion as you watch the hand point towards the front door.

"Um okay.." you say as you leave the bathroom and tiptoe towards the front door, hearing your dads loud snoring all the way there. You finally reach it and open it very slowly to reveal... no one, the porch was completely empty, "huh? But I thought someone wa-" "someone was trying to contact you?" A feminine voice said from behind. You whirl around, almost falling over due to the uneven weight, to see a tall woman standing over you: https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773...

"Who are you?" you ask the woman after calming down, "I will tell you that later, but now we must leave this place" she said determinedly as she exits the house while beckoning you to follow her. "Uh okay?" you say confused as you close the door and follow her around your house and into the woods where you have some difficulty catching up to her. Finally you reach a clearing and find her sitting in the middle surrounded by thick grass that is common in this area, "now you may speak, child" she says as she watches you sit in front of her, "How do you know I'm a child?" "You radiate such potent childish aura that is so thick it would be foolish to think you were an adult woman" she answers. "Um okay, Who are you?" "I am known as Sander among my peers, I am also the cause for your transformation" she says "really?! How did you do it?" You ask anxious for some answers.

She smiles before saying "through a bite that carried the very curse coursing through my veins", "what? when did you bite me?" you ask bewildered. "On this very day when you were walking to that house" she says as she points towards your house with her heavily manicured finger, "no that was a random guy and you're not a guy" "neither are you, child" she rebuttals with a smirk. To that you have no argument so you ask another question "why am I a girl?" "Because of a curse that was given to me through birth by my curse bearing parents".

You tilt your head in confusion, "What curse?" She closes her eyes and looks down, "It is a long story, but a more simple way of putting it is that from this point onward when the moon comes out during the night you will change into a female". Your eyes grow wide, "but...I don't want to be a girl at night, I want to be a boy!" you say angrily, "there is no cure to this curse, you are now a werewoman whether or not you desire to be or not!" Sander says with authority. You begin to cry, "but my family won't be able to take me anywhere anymore, will they even know who I am?" Sander hugs you and says, "it will be alright, child" "No it won't! I'm a girl and its all your fault" you say with tears streaming down your aunts face.

Sander sighs before saying, "I live in a village not too far from here filled with those also bearing the curse, I will guide you there if you wish but I will not stop you from going back to the house, it is all in your decision" Sander says as she stands up. What will you do?
15321112.title: Aunt

choices: You go your own way to find answers
153211121.content:
You didn't want anything to do with the person who ruined your life, but you wanted to know more about this strange curse. "Okay, I'll follow you but this place better be what you say it is" he nods and beckons you to follow him deeper into the woods....

You almost lose him a couple times but you stay on him the entire trip until you finally see him wander into a cave, you obviously follow him in but with even more uncertainty this time. You find the cave to be a bit of a maze, with twists and shadowy corners and some odd sounds but thankfully Sander was a great guide and never left you in one place for too long, "keep up child, we are almost to them". Finally you begin to see some lights and before long you see actual people! Every person was of every race, ethnicity, religion you name it they were there, well except everyone was a female. "Welcome, child, to Ramar!" Sander says spreading his arms out like a bird for some dramatic flair.

You notice the village is quite big, with many areas to shop and eat but still areas to settle down in as homes, you can even see buildings that go all the way up to caves ceiling and even see women in strange clothing going up to the top. "Ah, I see you've noticed the spire of the ancients" Sander says as he nudges you to follow him into the village-city, "the what?" You ask him confused "The spire of the ancients, where the oldest go to consult with those who have passed" "huh, like priests?" you ask confused "if you would like to think of it that way then yes, however I press you never to make that distinction in front of them, It can lead to unsavory results" he says kinda menacingly. "So.... everyone here is um a girl" you ask trying to move the topic away from 'the spire of the ancients', he sighs and says, "yes, child, everyone in this village has two X chromosomes, thanks to the curse" he says annoyed.

Where do you go now?
